data.comment: The match is underway in Getafe.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Villarreal throw-in in Getafe's half.
In the minute 2, Villarreal push upfield but Jose Luis Munuera Montero quickly pulls them for offside.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Throw-in for Villarreal in the half of Getafe.
Throw-in high up the field for Villarreal in Getafe.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Villarreal close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal take a 0-1 lead thanks to Paco Alcacer.
In the minute 11, Mario Gaspar with an assist there.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in Villarreal.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 16, Villarreal have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Villarreal push forward at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez and Raul Albiol gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Getafe defence.
Goal! Mauro Arambarri levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 17, Manu Trigueros scores to make it 1-2 at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
That's a fine assist from Moi Gomez.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 21, Moi Gomez is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Villarreal.
Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Getafe have a goal kick.
Getafe drive forward but Marc Cucurella is judged offside.
In the minute 26, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Getafe.
At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez, Vicente Iborra has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Enes Ünal (Getafe) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 28, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Getafe's Cucho Hernandez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 30, Paco Alcacer of Villarreal is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 32, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Villarreal throw-in in Getafe's half.
Angel Rodriguez is replacing Erick Cabaco for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Free kick Villarreal.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Getafe a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
Free kick for Villarreal in the half of Getafe.
Throw-in Getafe.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Villarreal pushes forward through Paco Alcacer, whose finish on goal is saved.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Getafe's David Timor looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 42, Attention is being given to Villarreal’s Dani Parejo and play has been suspended briefly.
David Timor is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
David Timor (Getafe) has received a first yellow card.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Villarreal’s Dani Parejo is on his feet again at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 45, Getafe drive upfield and Enes Ünal gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Villarreal defender.
Corner awarded to Getafe.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has come to a close in Getafe.
The second-half is underway at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 46, Jaime Mata is on a sub for David Timor for Getafe.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 48, Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 52, Can Villarreal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 52, Chema (Getafe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Victor Mollejo is replacing Enes Ünal for the home team.
Getafe are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Villarreal's Vicente Iborra misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Getafe have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Villarreal's half?
In the minute 58, Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a Getafe throw-in in Villarreal's half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Villarreal in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a throw-in for Villarreal, close to Getafe's area.
In the minute 62, Ball safe as Getafe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Villarreal extend their lead to 1-3 through Gerard Moreno.
Paco Alcacer instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 64, Angel Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Getafe.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards the home team a throw-in.
Villarreal will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Getafe.
In the minute 65, Villarreal's Manu Trigueros has been booked in Getafe.
Getafe's Mauro Arambarri gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Villarreal defender.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
In the minute 67, Victor Mollejo (Getafe) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Villarreal goal kick.
Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
In the minute 70, Getafe have a goal kick.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero signals a free kick to Getafe.
In the minute 72, Getafe push forward at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez and Nemanja Maksimovic gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Villarreal defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Sergio Asenjo.
In the minute 73, Villarreal make their first substitution with Francis Coquelin replacing Dani Parejo.
The away team replace Paco Alcacer with Carlos Bacca.
Villarreal's Sergio Asenjo is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Villarreal territory.
Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Villarreal.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Getafe in the half of Villarreal.
Angel Rodriguez of Getafe gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Villarreal a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Villarreal in their own half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Villarreal's half?
Villarreal have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Villarreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Villarreal's Gerard Moreno has run offside.
In Getafe Getafe drive forward through Marc Cucurella. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 86, Pervis Estupinan is on a sub for Moi Gomez for Villarreal.
Unai Emery (Villarreal) is making a fourth substitution, with Takefusa Kubo replacing Gerard Moreno.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
In the minute 88, Jose Luis Munuera Montero awards Villarreal a goal kick.
Villarreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Getafe.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Carlos Bacca for Villarreal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Getafe.
Getafe are in shooting range from this free kick.
Carlos Bacca (Villarreal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Villarreal.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-3.
Nemanja Maksimovic (Getafe) has received a yellow card from Jose Luis Munuera Montero.
Alfonso Pedraza for Villarreal has been booked by Jose Luis Munuera Montero and receives a first yellow card.
